value:
What I wear is of no concern, for the
pride of a Macedonian princess does
not waver. Not for an instant!

I was caught off guard... I had not
expected to ever don such garb
as this.

The Askran spring is beautiful indeed.
Riding wyvernback across the sky,
basking in the sun's warmth is...bliss.

I am not fond of festive dress, but
Maria put effort into this costume
for me. I wear it out of obligation.

This is no wyvern egg. It is merely
decorative. Wyvern eggs are quite
a bit larger, their shells harder.

I deliver a springtime greeting from
$Nf. Enjoy.

Let us celebrate both the coming of
spring and our victory with gaiety!

Whether in festive dress or not,
I must not perform shamefully.

This cannot be. For me to have
let this happen is...unthinkable.

I shall swear this spring season will
stir new growth in me as well.

I am Minerva, princess of Macedon.
I will do as you ask of me during
this spring festival.

Macedon, my homeland, was founded
by Iote, a king born as a slave. It was
not a wealthy country in those days.$k$pHowever, the people settled in the
thick forests and took to building
a country with wills of steel.$k$pAs a result of their efforts, Macedon
entered a new season, and their work
bore the fruit of abundance.$k$pEnduring a long winter carries the
promise of spring. In a way, it is a
reflection of Macedon's victory.$k$pSo, let us celebrate this season
together and soar even higher.$k$pSo that next year we may celebrate
this day again, and all it represents.
やあっ
It's spring!
くっ…
You...!
Here comes spring!
Be serious!
I am a princess and a warrior!
Eyes open!
The spring breeze...
Giggle
It seems that this is the garb of the spring festival. It is somewhat awkward.
Hm? A flower petal drifted onto my shoulder? I see. Thank you.
I heard that Palla and the other Whitewings participated in the festival before. I thought that this year, I would join in.
Rabbits, eggs, and pretty colors... This festival is full of adorable decorations. Maria would love it.
Spring is a wonderful season. I feel that everything is given new life.
I would not much like for my brother to encounter me in this attire.
Next time, I would like to show you Macedon in spring.
This way?
I see...
Lovely and warm.
